name: virologist
content:

a scientist who studies viruses and the diseases that they cause: The world-leading virologist has joined the new EU COVID-19 advisory team. Each February, World Health Organization (WHO) doctors meet virologists to identify the flu strains they think will hit the following winter.
More examplesFewer examplesMany virologists and epidemiologists believe the springtime virus acquired a mutation that made it deadly as well as contagious, which it already was.Virologists say that to be effective, an Aids vaccine needs to be tested in an area of high HIV-prevalence.The daughter of a leading virologist has written an e-book to help young children cope with Covid-19.
